Translations.Text: Zhongren a! Nimen yingdang jingwei nimen de zhu, fuhuo shi di dizhen, que shi yi jian dashi

Zai na ri, nimen kanjian dizhen xia mei ge rumu dou bei xia de wangjile ying'er, xia de mei ge yunfu dou yao liuchan; ni ba renmen kan cheng zui han, qishi tamen bingfei shi zui han, er shi yin wei zhenzhu de xingfa shi yanjun de
Youren wuzhi di jinxing guanyu zhenzhu de zhenglun, bingqie shuncong panni de emo
Fan jiejiao emo zhe, emo biding shi ta mi wu, biding ba ta yinru huo yu de xingfa, zhe shi gei zhudingle de

Zhongren a! Ruguo nimen duiyu fuhuo de shi hai zai huaiyi zhi zhong, name, wo que yi chuangzaole nimen, xian yong nitu, ji yong yi xiao di jingye, ji yong yikuai ningxie, ji yong wanzheng de he bu wanzheng de rou tuan, yibian wo dui nimen chanming (daoli). Wo shi wo suo yiyu de (tai'er) zai zigong li anju yige ding qi, ranhou, wo shi nimen chusheng wei ying'er, ranhou (wo rang nimen huozhe) yibian nimen dadao chengnian. Nimen zhong you yaozhe de; you fu fan yu zui lie de nianji de, yibian ta zai you zhishi zhihou, shenme ye bu zhidao. Ni kan dadi shi bumao de, dang wo shi yushui jiang yu dadi de shihou, ta jiu huodong he pengzhang, erqie shengchu ge zhong meili de zhiwu
Zhe shi yin wei zhenzhu shi zhen zai, ta neng shi sizhe fusheng, ta duiyu wanshi shi quanneng de
Fuhuo que shi yao lailin de, hao wuyi yi, zhenzhuyao shi fenmu li de ren fuhuo qilai
Youren zhenglun zhenzhu, dan ta ji wu zhishi, you wu zhidao, qie wu canlan de jingdian
Ta aoman de zou kai, yibian you ren panli zhenzhu de dadao. Ta zai jinshi yao shou lingru, fuhuo ri wo yao shi ta changshi shaozhuo de xingfa
Zhe shi yinwei ni suo fan de zuixing, ye yin wei zhenzhu jue bushi kuidai zhong puren de
Youren zai bianyuan shang chongbai zhenzhu, ruo huo fuli, ta jiu anran xiangshou; ruo zao huohai, ta jiu qingshuai beipan. Ta jiang sangshi jinshi he houshi, zhe shi mingxian de kuisun
Ta she zhenzhu er qidao na duiyu ta ji wu huo you wu fu de dongxi, zhe shi bu jin qingli de mi wu
Ta qidao na you jin huo er wu yuan fu de dongxi, ta de yuanzhu zhe zhen elie! Zuo ta de tongban de zhen elie
zhenzhu biding yao shi xindao erqie xingshan zhe jinru na xia lin zhu he de leyuan. Zhenzhu que shi weisuoyuwei de
Shei caixiang zhenzhu zai jinshi he houshi jue bu xiangzhu ta, jiao shei xuanliang zi jin, jiao ta kan ta de jice neng fou jiechu ta de fennu
wo zheyang jiang shi “gulanjing”, zuowei mingxian de jixiang, zhenzhu que shi yindao tasuo yu yindao de
Xindao zhe, youtai jiaotu, bai xing jiaotu, jidu jiaotu, baihuojiao tu, yiji yi wu pei zhu zhe, fuhuo ri zhenzhu biding yao wei tamen panjue, zhenzhu que shi wanwu de jianzheng

Ni nandao bu zhidao ma? Zai tianshang de he zai dishang de, yu ri yue qunxing, shanyue shumu, shengchu he xuduo ren, dou fucong zhenzhu, you xuduo ren dang shou xingfa. Zhenzhu lingru shei, shei bu shou ren zunjing. Zhenzhu que shi weisuoyuwei de.※§
